fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.activegamechanger

Class ActiveGameChanger

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.activegamechanger.ActiveGameChanger

  • public class ActiveGameChanger
extends Object
    The instance of this class creates the game, either a new one or from a file.
    Author:
    iah1016

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ActiveGameChanger(Random random, Config config)
      Random and Config objects are given to the constructor; CreateVillagers, PlayerAndSecHandler, Save- and LoadGameHandler objects are created by the constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ActiveGame createNewActiveGame(String[] playerAndSectNames)
      This method creates a new active game.
      ActiveGame loadActiveGame(File saveFile)
      This method loads a game from a file.
      boolean saveActiveGame(File saveFile, ActiveGame activeGame)
      Saves the active game by using SaveGameHandler's method.
      void setConfigIntValues(Map<String,Integer> configIntValues)
      This method is used for updating Config variables when loaded from a save file.
      boolean updateConfigValues(File configFile, File villagerNamesFile, File professionsFile)
      Config variable values, villager names and professions are updated before creating a new active game.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActiveGameChanger

        public ActiveGameChanger(Random random,
                         Config config)
        Random and Config objects are given to the constructor; CreateVillagers, PlayerAndSecHandler, Save- and LoadGameHandler objects are created by the constructor. All of them are immutable object variables.
        Parameters:
        random - Random is needed by CreateVillagers and the Conversion classes.
        config - The object is immutable but its values are updated on every active game change.

    • Method Detail

      • createNewActiveGame

        public ActiveGame createNewActiveGame(String[] playerAndSectNames)
        This method creates a new active game.
        Parameters:
        playerAndSectNames - Player and Sect names from the user's input.
        Returns:
        Returns a new active game.

      • loadActiveGame

        public ActiveGame loadActiveGame(File saveFile)
        This method loads a game from a file.
        Parameters:
        saveFile - The save file.
        Returns:
        Returns the ActiveGame or null if loading is unsuccessful.

      • saveActiveGame

        public boolean saveActiveGame(File saveFile,
                              ActiveGame activeGame)
        Saves the active game by using SaveGameHandler's method.
        Parameters:
        saveFile - The save file.
        activeGame - The active game to be saved.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the saving succeeds.

      • updateConfigValues

        public boolean updateConfigValues(File configFile,
                                  File villagerNamesFile,
                                  File professionsFile)
                           throws Exception
        Config variable values, villager names and professions are updated before creating a new active game.
        Parameters:
        configFile - The configuration variable values file.
        villagerNamesFile - The villager names file.
        professionsFile - The professions file.
        Returns:
        Returns false if at least one of the files is invalid.
        Throws:
        Exception - Throws the generic exception.

      • setConfigIntValues

        public void setConfigIntValues(Map<String,Integer> configIntValues)
        This method is used for updating Config variables when loaded from a save file.
        Parameters:
        configIntValues - loaded successfully from a save file.
